itemizedlist.listitem: None of the old windows have been removed in this update.

Outcomes - When viewing an outcome in detail, you'll now see a list of any associated funding uploads the outcome is attached to. You'll see the date the export was run, who it was run by and the status of the export as it was set in the History panel of the AVETMISS 8 Export window.

section.title: Major features
section.para: The following windows have been migrated to the new user interface:

listitem.para: Documents

section.para: For users of onCourse in the web browser, we've also implemented a method of moving between different windows in onCourse that allows you to use the back and forward buttons on your browser without losing any search or filtering information. This also means you've be able to save windows as bookmarks in your browser for easy recovery and use another time.
